title: flex rank is in the front of my profile

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: hi everyone so today after the honor rework they changed profiles look so you have to put the mouse courser over your rank in order to see other ranks (flex and 3v3 ) and only one ranked will be in the front of your profile so in my case its my flex rank witch is g 5 while to see my solo duo rank i have to put my mouse over the shown rank in order to my solo duo rank which is g 3 how can i make my solo duo rank be in the front and why is my flex rank is the one in the front when its lower than my solo duo rank

replies.body: **Riot Socrates** has [confirmed this is bug](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6km96p/my_flexq_rank_is_lower_than_my_soloq_rank_but_my/djndnf0/). There should be a solution up in a few days :D
